Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Goliath
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
More of a movable mini-base than a deployment pod, Goliath is an expensive but powerful solution to any immovable enemy object. Equipped with four military turret stations and a long range rocket swarm turret at the top, this siege pod is capable of raining fire in 360 degree radius. Nearly impenetrable, it can serve as a portable base of operations, keeping all troops inside safe.

Itâ€™s incredibly heavy and lift off requires single-use boosters that separate once the trajectory and velocity is reached. In order to lift off again, the boosters need to be rebuilt.

Being a flying vehicle, it is extremely obvious when on the move.
